channel.title: Ejeh Daniel.dev RSS Feed
channel.description: Personal website and project by Ejeh Daniel

item.title: How I Built a Tech Event Discovery Platform with Real-Time Scraping
item.description: A platform that caters exclusively to tech events with a clean interface and smooth experience, using real-time scraping as users search.
item.content:encoded: A platform that caters exclusively to tech events with a clean interface and smooth experience, using real-time scraping as users search.

item.title: You Don't Always Need useCallback and useMemo
item.description: When memoisation actually helps, when it's counterproductive, and which modern alternatives provide better solutions in React.
item.content:encoded: When memoisation actually helps, when it's counterproductive, and which modern alternatives provide better solutions in React.

item.title: Understanding How Computers Actually Work
item.description: A deep dive into how computers work from the ground up—from binary and transistors to logic gates, CPU cycles, memory hierarchy, and operating systems.
item.content:encoded: A deep dive into how computers work from the ground up—from binary and transistors to logic gates, CPU cycles, memory hierarchy, and operating systems.

item.title: How I Built an n8n Community Node for Neon Database
item.description: Building a custom n8n community node for Neon database that supports CRUD operations, branch switching, and follows n8n's conventions with parameterized queries for security.
item.content:encoded: Building a custom n8n community node for Neon database that supports CRUD operations, branch switching, and follows n8n's conventions with parameterized queries for security.
